SELECT mer.mer_name AS merName, mer.mer_code AS merCode, me.supplier_wholesale_settle_method AS cooperationMode, SUM( wpsd.trans_amount ) AS totalConsumeAmount, SUM( wpsd.order_wholesale_amount ) AS unSettleAmount, SUM( wpsd.trans_amount ) - SUM( wpsd.order_wholesale_amount ) AS revenueAmount FROM merchant mer LEFT JOIN merchant_extend me ON mer.mer_code = me.mer_code LEFT JOIN supplier_store ss ON mer.mer_code = ss.mer_code LEFT JOIN wholesale_payable_settle_detail wpsd ON wpsd.store_code = ss.store_code WHERE mer.mer_identity LIKE '%SUPPLIER%' AND me.supplier_wholesale_settle_method IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH( trim( me.supplier_wholesale_settle_method ) ) > 0 AND wpsd.settle_flag = 'unsettled'
and mer.mer_code
GROUP BY mer.mer_code order by mer.id desc
